summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4436 for the improvement of the alley in Blocks 7 and 8, Evans & Blewett's Addition, being the alley between 3rd Avenue West and 4th Avenue West, from West Crockett Street to West McGraw Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52356, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
